availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Ostego County, New York, native. Married Sarah "Sallie" Louise Wheeler Gazlay in Oldham County, Kentucky, in February 11, 1851. Father of Addison Gazlay and Sallie Gazlay. Store clerk in Broome County, New York. Joined the bar in Louisville in 1845. Attorney in Oldham County in 1850. Attorney in Louisville in 1860. Attorney in partnership with Franklin Gorin in Louisville in 1861. Notary public in Jefferson County in 1861.
